---

description: "Returns a list of all the available portal languages in the format of a two-letter or four-letter language code (e.g. 'de', 'en-US', etc.)."

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get supported languages"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/2.0/settings/cultures"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns a list of all the available portal languages in the format of a two-letter or four-letter language code (e.g. "de", "en-US", etc.).

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"List of all the available portal languages","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"string"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
